Package processing

Class Processor

java.lang.Object
processing.Processor
public class Processor extends Object
The processor class translates the AST given by the Parser to actual objects that can be used when creating the document TODO: Publication TODO: Title
Since:
1.0

  • Field Details

    • SUPPORTED_VERSIONS

      public static final String[] SUPPORTED_VERSIONS
      Determines the Pipp versions this compiler supports. If the user tries to scan a document with a Pipp version not included in this array, an error is thrown, and the user should be prompted to update this compiler or check if they misspelled the version.

    • documentType

      public static DocumentType documentType
      Determines the type of the document, which currently only affects the document's metadata

    • usedStyleGuide

      public static StyleGuide usedStyleGuide
      Determines the type of style guide which should be used during compilation

    • dimensions

      public static org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.common.PDRectangle dimensions
      Determines the dimensions of the document (the width and height)

    • margin

      public static float margin
      Determines the margin in points (pt.) to all four sides of the document. All components need to have a minimum position of the margin to the left and top, and a maximum position of the margin to the right and bottom.

    • spacing

      public static float spacing
      Determines the paragraph spacing as a float, which is the space between each line in a paragraph. The spacing is multiplied by the font size (and font size increment factor) to calculate line leading. Note that the unit is a float! It is not represented in points, inches or any other measurement.

    • numerationType

      public static NumerationType numerationType
      Determines how page numbers should be represented

    • numerationPosition

      public static NumerationPosition numerationPosition
      Determines where in the document page numbers should be displayed

    • numerationMargin

      public static float numerationMargin
      Determines the page number margin to the respective sides of the document

    • numerationAuthorName

      public static NumerationAuthorName numerationAuthorName
      Determines how the names of the authors should be inserted before the page number. If there should not be a name before the page number, this value is null.

    • skippedPages

      public static List<Integer> skippedPages
      Contains all page numbers that the user does not want to have page numbers. For each created page, the list will be checked if it contains the current page number, and if it does, it will not receive a numeration stamp.

    • font

      public static org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFont font
      Determines the main font family used throughout the document

    • fontSize

      public static float fontSize
      Determines the main font size in points (pt.) used throughout the document

    • fontColour

      public static Color fontColour
      Determines the main font size used throughout the document

    • paragraphIndentation

      public static float paragraphIndentation
      Determines the paragraph indentation, which is the amount of space that a new paragraph will be indented to

    • sentencePrefix

      public static String sentencePrefix
      Determines the string that will be appended before each sentence. In most style guides, this is a single space.

    • allowBoldText

      public static AllowanceType allowBoldText
      Determines if the user is allowed to use bold text in a sentence

    • allowItalicText

      public static AllowanceType allowItalicText
      Determines if the user is allowed to use italic text in a sentence

    • allowWhitespace

      public static WhitespaceAllowanceType allowWhitespace
      Determines if the user is allowed to use white space in a sentence

    • requiredStructureBeforeEndnotes

      public static StructureType requiredStructureBeforeEndnotes
      Determines the type of structure that needs to appear before the user can declare an end notes section. This value can be null, if no structure is required to appear before the section.

    • authors

      public static Author[] authors
      Determines the authors that have worked on the document. Note that this only includes the authors of the working document, it does not include authors that have been cited from in the document

    • assessors

      public static Assessor[] assessors
      Determines the assessors that may assess the document

    • publicationDate

      public static LocalDate publicationDate
      Determines the date of document publication. Note that if the user has explicitly expressed not to display the date, this is null.

    • documentBody

      public static Stack<Object> documentBody

      public Processor()

      A simple automatically-generated method to represent the values of all properties of the processor

      toString in class Object

      - the values of the processor

    • processAST

      public void processAST(@NonNull @NonNull AST ast)
      Starts the processing phase by trying to convert the specified AST into usable objects.
      Parameters:
      ast - - the abstract syntax tree produced by the Parser
